title: Customized Network-Based University Innovation Education Simulation Program

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: A customized educational environment to strengthen scientific innovation capabilities for in-service professionals

learning_goals: Learners can apply three or more innovative approaches for scientific problem-solving in a VR environment
Real-time collaborative learning scenarios can be performed with over 80% accuracy using customized network systems
Individual learning performance can be diagnosed on a four-level scale through data clustering and machine learning-based evaluation systems
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
